name: Martin McDANIEL and Hilda Solomond, Appellants, v. CHRYSLER CORPORATION

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Martin McDANIEL and Hilda Solomond, Appellants, v. CHRYSLER CORPORATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Mark B. Aronson, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Frederick N. Egler, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
488 A.2d 1110
Martin McDANIEL and Hilda Solomond, Appellants, v. CHRYSLER CORPORATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1985.
Decided March 20, 1985.
Mark B. Aronson, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Frederick N. Egler, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
